Name: Freespace 2
About the game: The year is 2367, thirty two years after the Great War. Or at least that is what YOU thought was the Great War. The endless line of Shivan capital ships, bombers and fighters with super advanced technology was nearly overwhelming. As the Terran and Vasudan races finish rebuilding their decimated societies, a disturbance lurks in the not-so-far reaches of the Gamma Draconis system. Your nemeses have arrived... and they are wondering what happened to their scouting party.
Meta Title: Freespace 2: Jun 6, 2014, Volition Inc and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Freespace 2? Check out the release date (Jun 6, 2014), developer insights from Volition Inc, and a complete game summary.
